<style>
  .infobox {
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 2147483647;
    background: rgba(255,255,255,.92);
    padding: 0 .8rem;
    height: 2.2rem;
    line-height: 2.2rem;
    border-radius: .5rem;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.12);
    font-size: .9rem;
    font-family: inherit;
    white-space: nowrap;
  }

  /* Bottom-left navigation bar */
  .navbox {
    bottom: 20px; left: 20px;
    font-weight: normal;
    color: #333333; /* dark grey */
  }
  .navbox a {
    margin-right: .75rem;
    position: relative;
    color: #333333; /* dark grey */
    text-decoration: none;       /* remove default underline */
    transition: color 0.2s ease;
  }
  .navbox a::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    left: 0; bottom: -2px;
    width: 100%; height: 2px;
    background-color: #aaaaaa;   /* light grey underline */
    transform: scaleX(0);        /* hidden by default */
    transform-origin: right;
    transition: transform 0.25s ease;
  }
  .navbox a:hover {
    color: #aaaaaa;              /* light grey on hover */
  }
  .navbox a:hover::after {
    transform: scaleX(1);        /* animate underline in */
    transform-origin: left;
  }
  .navbox a:last-child { margin-right: 0; }

  /* Top-right course bar */
  .coursebar {
    top: 15px; right: 20px;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #333333; /* always dark grey */
  }
</style>

<div class="infobox navbox">
  <a id="go-first" href="#1">First</a>
  <a id="go-prev" href="#">Previous</a>
  <a id="go-dir" href="../index.html">Directory</a>
  <a id="go-next" href="#">Next</a>
  <a id="go-last" href="#">Last</a>
</div>

<div class="infobox coursebar">
  LING201 â€“ Introduction to Linguistic Theories
</div>

<script>
(function () {
  function ready(fn){
    if (document.readyState !== 'loading') fn();
    else document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', fn);
  }
  ready(function initNav(){
    var tries = 0, iv = setInterval(function(){
      tries++;
      var ss = window.slideshow;
      if (ss && (ss.gotoNextSlide || ss.next)) {
        clearInterval(iv);

        // Set Last link
        if (ss.getSlideCount) {
          document.getElementById('go-last').href = '#' + ss.getSlideCount();
        }

        // Wire Prev/Next
        document.getElementById('go-prev').addEventListener('click', function(e){
          e.preventDefault(); (ss.gotoPreviousSlide || ss.prev).call(ss);
        });
        document.getElementById('go-next').addEventListener('click', function(e){
          e.preventDefault(); (ss.gotoNextSlide || ss.next).call(ss);
        });
      }
      if (tries > 200) clearInterval(iv);
    }, 50);
  });
})();
</script>
